name: Fundamentals of Computer Science
description: Core concepts in computing, including data organization and algorithm design.

name: Backend Development
description: Server-side logic, databases, APIs, and architecture that power applications.

name: DevOps & Cloud Computing
description: Practices and tools that combine software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops).

name: Mobile Development
description: Creating applications for mobile devices like smartphones and tablets.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: The theory and development of computer systems able to perform tasks normally requiring human intelligence.

name: Programming & Practices
description: General programming languages and essential software development practices.

name: Data Structures
description: Ways of organizing and storing data efficiently for various operations.

name: Algorithms
description: Step-by-step procedures for solving computational problems and performing calculations.

name: Databases
description: Systems for storing, retrieving, and managing structured data.

name: SQL
description: Structured Query Language for managing and querying relational databases.

name: NoSQL
description: Non-relational databases designed for flexible, scalable data storage.

name: REST API
description: Representational State Transfer architecture for designing web services.

name: GraphQL
description: Query language and runtime for APIs that allows clients to request specific data.

name: Microservices
description: Architectural approach where applications are built as a collection of small, independent services.

name: Networking
description: Concepts and protocols for connecting and communicating between computer systems.

name: Concurrency
description: Techniques for handling multiple tasks simultaneously in software systems.

name: System Design
description: Architectural principles for building large-scale, distributed systems.

name: Cloud Basics
description: Fundamental concepts of cloud computing and cloud service models.

name: AWS
description: Amazon Web Services cloud platform and its various services.

name: Docker
description: Containerization platform for packaging and deploying applications.

name: Kubernetes
description: Container orchestration platform for managing containerized applications at scale.

name: CI/CD
description: Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment practices for software development.

name: Android Basics
description: Fundamental concepts for developing Android mobile applications.

name: Android Jetpack
description: Suite of libraries and tools for Android app development.

name: Kotlin
description: Modern programming language for Android and cross-platform development.

name: iOS Basics
description: Fundamental concepts for developing iOS mobile applications.

name: Swift
description: Programming language developed by Apple for iOS, macOS, and other platforms.

name: SwiftUI
description: Declarative UI framework for building user interfaces across Apple platforms.

name: Xcode
description: Apple's integrated development environment for creating apps for Apple platforms.

name: App Lifecycle
description: Understanding how mobile applications start, run, and terminate.

name: Core Data
description: Apple's framework for managing object graphs and persistence in iOS and macOS apps.

name: AI Basics
description: Fundamental concepts and principles of artificial intelligence.

name: Machine Learning
description: Algorithms and techniques that enable computers to learn from data.

name: Deep Learning
description: Machine learning using neural networks with multiple layers.

name: NLP
description: Natural Language Processing for understanding and generating human language.

name: Computer Vision
description: Field of AI that enables computers to interpret and understand visual information.

name: PyTorch
description: Open-source machine learning framework developed by Facebook.

name: TensorFlow
description: Open-source machine learning framework developed by Google.

name: Model Evaluation
description: Techniques for assessing the performance and quality of machine learning models.

name: Prompt Engineering
description: Art and science of crafting effective prompts for AI language models.

name: LLMs
description: Large Language Models and their applications in natural language processing.

name: Python
description: High-level programming language popular for data science, AI, and web development.

name: Go
description: Programming language developed by Google, known for simplicity and concurrency.

name: Java
description: Object-oriented programming language widely used for enterprise applications.

name: Debugging
description: Process of finding and fixing defects or problems in computer programs.

name: Security
description: Practices and techniques for protecting software systems and data from threats.
